clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study of Sildenafil in COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot Study of Sildenafi in the Treatment of COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock:
Observe the efficacy and safety of G1(Sildenafil citrate tablets) in patients with COVID-19
      under clinical actual diagnosis and treatment conditions

primary_outcome.description:
fever,cough and other symptoms relieved with improved lung CT;
SPO2>93% or PaO2/FiO2 >300mmHg without oxygen inhalation.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of entering the critical stage
Time of entering the critical stage

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Biochemical criterion (CK, ALT, Mb) recovery
Rate of undetectable viral RNA (continuous twice)

secondary_outcome.description: From the date of enrollment to the time when the subject is released from the hospital or transferred to the corresponding department for treatment of other diseases according to the condition.
All adverse events will be coded and described using the International Medical Terms Dictionary (MedDRA).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Patients diagnosed as COVID-19:

               1. mild patient: fever,respiratory and other symptoms, the manifestation of
                  pneumonia can be seen on imaging.

               2. severe patients: meet the definition of severe pneumonia(comply with any of the
                  followings): Shortness of breath,RR≥30 bpm;In a resting
                  state:SPO2≤93%;PaO2/FiO2≤300mmHg.

          2. Age≥18 years old,unlimited gender.

          3. Patients who cannot stop the following drugs during the trial:erythromycin or strong
             inhibitors of CYP3A4 (such as saquinavir,ketoconazole,itraconazole),nonspecific
             inhibitors of CYP (such as cimetidine),HIV protease inhibitors (such as ritonavir).

          4. Willing to participate in this study,signed Informed Consent and willing to
             participate in regular follow-up during the study.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Suffer from severe cognitive impairment or mental illness.

          2. Pregnant and lactating women.

          3. Patients taking nitric oxide drugs and nitrates in any dosage form.

          4. Patients with malignant tumors;AMI, stroke or life-threatening arrhythmias within 6
             months;hereditary pigmented retinitis;heart failure or unstable angina pectoris of
             coronary heart disease;patients with severe hypotension and hypertension.

          5. Patients who are allergic to the study drug or the researcher believes it is not
             appropriate.

          6. Participate in other clinical studies at the same time.
